reviews.review: The game itself is good. I love being able to decide whether I want to be a survivor or test my skill as a killer. Friendships can be made and tested. there's not much that I dislike about the game. I've been playing since it first released on playstation and have since bought it on PC and other consoles. I would recommend trying it out.

Excelente juego para jugar con tus amigos/as. Lastima la gente toxica que no quiere jugar y solo te hace enojar...

pd: Michael Myers te amo
It's all about survival.   The game is very challenging, testing your skills, reflexes, will to survive (if you're playing survivor of course), and teamwork.  You must give it a try!!
Tenho mais de 500h de game no xbox one e tenho autoridade para dizer que esse game vale a pena ser jogado (com amigo).
Honestly one of the best games ive played in a while
Jogo bem divertido, principalmente pra jogar com amigos, tem uns bugs mas da pra relevar um pouco, o jogo é bom
i spend my days grinding for bloodpoints only for my labor to produce little fruit, and my sanity lower. 10/10 i hate it

El juego me encanta, no puedo dejarlo por nada en verdad y ahora que sacaran el nuevo DLC es un encanto, pero muchas veces los bugs o los falsos golpes no ayudan mucho a los survs, de killer casi no juego pero intentare practicar XD, pero si lo recomiendo muchisimo

Отличная игра среди прочих кооперативных хоррор и просто сурвайвал игр, в которой интерес поддерживается разнообразием геймплея. К тому же разработчики постоянно валят контентом, а комьюнити активнее, чем у некоторых игр от компаний-гигантов, так что нового игрока удивить несложно.

Из минусов отмечу повышенную токсичность в значительной доле матчей. И даже если туннелинг и кемпинг ещё можно назвать предусмотренными разработчиками, вокруг которых можно научиться отыгрывать, то предвзятое отношение к национальности убийцы - высшее проявление токсика. Впрочем, ситуация острая далеко не только в этой игре, так что если вы привыкли игнорировать всю соль в вашу сторону (только так и надо) - проблем точно не будет.
jeux vraiment pourris au fils du temps des DLC

Près de 400h sur ce jeu, je ne comprend pas comment au fil du temps le matchmaking se dégrade ainsi que le gameplay, pendant 5 ans la qualité a fait le yoyo, a fuir a moins que le jeu soit a 5 euro pour l'essayer.
La verdad es un juego muy bueno, tiene sus pros y sus contras así como podes tener partidas épicas también tenes algunas bochornosas. Si tenes la plata compralo se lo merece
Pretty toxic at times, but a blast nonetheless. Be prepared to lose playing survivor or killer. Remember, all survivors are rats no matter the rank.
koxówa jak gra sie w ekipie; pozdrawiam dobrych chlopakow
istanbulu daha kolay fethederdık orospu evlatları bu nasıl oyun
Muy buen juego, mas divertido con amigos
Все супер , ну такое , на любителя .... мне зашло ))))
Muy Bueno, Miren AgustinUnaplay En facebook.

Stupid maps random system.

The random of map system are very stupid, no good zone in my map.

Good and Fun to play with Survivor with Friends [SWF] (Solo Queues for me is PRETTY long). Fun to play with Killers lots of ways to play as Killer with a sh*t ton of perks (obviously Survivors too).

I just wish some events they had for the summer for an example (Magaritas Gens) and rewards were worth playing and grinding.
4 survivors pitting their wits against a sadistic killer, best played with friends, but great fun!

Dead by Daylight is my all time favorite game! I'm so happy to have been with Behavior from the get go, they have licensed some amazing killers and brought their own amazing content as well! If you like to be on the edge of your seat, this is the game for you! Hope to see you in the fog!
rapor uygulaması kesinlikle çalışmıyor ama buna rağmen oynaması inanılmaz keyifli bir oyun
I started off playing on DBD on Ps4 Console, This was always a fun game to play the pc experince made it much of a funner game to play much more skilled players with different ways to play
Not my favourite game but my mate wanted me to get it so I did. Kind of nice when the huntress follows me around and throws axes at me. Makes me feel wanted.
Прекрасная сессионка - которая позволяет играть в разном режиме. Отлично помогает скоротать часок другой
Sadece "Güzel" bir oyun. Bu tarzda, arkadaşlarınızla uzun süreli oynayabileceğiniz tek oyun. Daha iyisini bulursanız haber verin ben bulamadım.
kill people or don't be killed. fun

This is my favorite game, but I don't recommend to anyone who doesn't want to cause self harm or brain damage.
: )
It is a great game to play with friends you need to be able to communicate tho
Awesome game with a lot of in-depth lore still to be discovered.

Dead by Daylight es como un pais tercermundista.
Nada mas que en vez de un Gobierno corrupto tenes a la Entidad y en lugar de milicos tenes asesinos.
игра прикольная меня выебали в жопу несколько раз
best horror multiplayer game you can get your hands on

Oynayabileceğiniz en eylenceli noline oyunlardan. başlarda beceremeseniz de bi şans verin pişman olmazsınız.
Tek sıkıntısı bazı zamanlar oyun baya buglı oluyo
Жене очень нравиться данная игра. Я и сам частенько играю за любимого маньяка Анну!))

"Oh boy I found the hatch!"
Hatch closes, BING BONG
this game smells like victory while not always set up for success one may still succeed
Ah yes another SWF group all running: Self Care, Dead Hard, Borrowed Time, and Iron Will. Oh a key and three flashlights....How Original....
At the time only having a mere 11 hours, hoevery Ive been playing since the release of clown on console. I LOVE this game!
